Description: Available unit in modern apartment building with elevator. Easy access to Dunkin Donuts, Nubian Square and Silver Line, Roxbury Crossing T Station, cafes, restaurants and South Bay Shopping Center. This spacious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom unit features a primary en-suite, hardwood flooring throughout, recessed and decorative lighting, kitchen with island, in-unit laundry and an open-concept design. The building has a lobby, mini- gym, roof deck w/ grill and patio furniture! First month's rent, full month security deposit and broker's fee required.
